definition: permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: A dewar tube with vacuum multi-layer insulated material is described in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種採用真空多層絕熱材料製作的恆溫器。

sentences.english: The cam member operably connects a temperature control knob to the thermostat.
sentences.chinese: 凸輪元件把一個溫度控制旋鈕可操作地連接於恆溫器。

sentences.english: The thermostat on the balcony's doorpost?
sentences.chinese: 這條陽臺門柱上的恆溫器？

sentences.english: Spend time shopping for the right mattress and pillow, and adjust your thermostat to the best temperature for you.
sentences.chinese: 購買合適的牀墊和枕頭，將恆溫器調到最適合的溫度。

sentences.english: Yesterday, our thermostat read 59 at 1 PM.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我們的恆溫器讀取下午1點59。

sentences.english: Consider a programmable thermostat to raise and lower the temperature at pre-set times.
sentences.chinese: 使用可編程的恆溫器以便在預設的時間自動升降溫。

sentences.english: Millions of homes are stillequipped with manual thermostats.
sentences.chinese: 數百萬家庭仍在使用手動恆溫器。

sentences.english: They"ll quickly adjust her thermostat to high heat.
sentences.chinese: 他們會很快調整自己恆溫器到高熱量。

sentences.english: Turn off your thermostat when you’re not home.
sentences.chinese: 當你不在家的時候關掉恆溫器。

sentences.english: For energy-efficient thermal management, a thermostatic fan control option is available.
sentences.chinese: 在節能熱管理方面可以使用恆溫器風扇控制項。

sentences.english: It is, after all, a thermostat.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這畢竟只是一款恆溫器。

sentences.english: You can regulate the temperature in the house by adjusting the thermostat and radiators.
sentences.chinese: 通過調節恆溫器和散熱器你可以調節屋內溫度。

sentences.english: Carbon dioxide is the planet's thermostat.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳是地球的恆溫器。

sentences.english: The more advanced programmable thermostats are difficult to use and require constant adjustments.
sentences.chinese: 高級的可編程恆溫器很難使用而且需要不斷配置。

sentences.english: You should / ought to turn down your thermostat to save energy.
sentences.chinese: 你應該調低恆溫器來節約能源。

sentences.english: The thermostat is nothing more than an electric switch that opens and closes itself at the proper temperature.
sentences.chinese: 恆溫器只不過是一種到達適當溫度就自動開關的電閘。
